en.title: Who are we?
en.subtitle: Our mission: make fitness simple and accessible for everyone
en.description: Harmonith was built to make fitness simple, fun, and accessible. Choose your exercises, tweak the load, reps, or cardio time, and track your progress with ease.

team.name: Moha
team.bio: A code enthusiast (and proud lazy-mode advocate), Moha designed Harmonith to take the friction out of fitness. Blending a passion for development with love for training, the goal is an app that adapts to me‚Ä¶ and to you.

team.name: Nono
team.bio: Hooked on writing and fitness, Nono helps keep Harmonith clear, inspiring, and motivating. The aim: turn information into helpful, energizing content so everyone feels ready to push further.

team.name: Chems
team.bio: Energetic and creative, Chems brings the Harmonith community to life every day. Between motivation, sport, and team spirit, the goal is to connect people and inspire everyone to go further‚Äîtogether.

values.title: Simplicity first
